name: BollywoodTrivia
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: bollywood trivia
des: Bollywood is one of the largest film industries in the world in terms of the number of films produced and the number of people employed. In 2011, 3.5 billion tickets were sold internationally, in comparison to 900,000 tickets in Hollywood. There are many supports of Bollywood which makes this trivia game more exciting fans to test their knowledge and for everyone to learn fun facts about the industry!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
